mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, pw, name, tel, imgname, like_categories, introduce, imgPath) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{imgname}, #{like_categories}, #{introduce}, #{imgPath})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pageon.member WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR tel LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
